translations: 群众；大量的东西（mass 的复数）
（使）聚集，（使）集结（mass 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: He was an elitist who had no time for the masses.
sentences.translation: 他是个精英主义者，没时间给民众。

sentences.sentence: His music is commercial. It is aimed at the masses.
sentences.translation: 他的音乐很商业化，针对的是一般大众。

sentences.sentence: The books were intended for the edification of the masses.
